title: Captain Marvel Star Brie Larson Reportedly Wants To Quit MCU Over Toxic Fans
description:
Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel has become one of the MCU’s biggest players. As such, plenty of fans are excited to see where her story goes in The Marvels. On the other hand, plenty of Marvel fans have also been toxic towards Brie Larson, and now a report claims that she wants to quit the MCU […]

title: Horror Fans Are Revisiting A Classic Slasher Franchise On Max
description:
In exciting news for horror movie enthusiasts, an iconic slasher franchise has made its way to Max, just in time for Halloween. Fans of the series can look forward to a thrilling marathon as nearly the entire franchise, consisting of eight films, available to watch on the streaming platform.
